2009-05-25 17:36:32 - main - <br>Class: CAllTask<br>File: /home/a/avangard/public_html/bitrix/modules/main/classes/general/user.php<br>Function: GetList<br>Line: 2155 MySql Query Error: 
			SELECT
				T.ID, T.NAME, T.DESCRIPTION, T.MODULE_ID, T.LETTER, T.SYS, T.BINDING
			FROM
				b_task T
			WHERE
				(1=1
					AND
					(
						( 
					(upper(T.LETTER) like upper('%%') and T.LETTER is not null)
					 )
					)
					
					AND
					(
						( 
					(upper(T.MODULE_ID) like upper('%%') and T.MODULE_ID is not null)
					 )

SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '359'))))
			)
			
		 [Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock' (111)]

NAME,BE.PREVIEW_PICTURE as PREVIEW_PICTURE,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT as PREVIEW_TEXT,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE as PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE,BE.DETAIL_PICTURE as DETAIL_PICTURE,BE.DETAIL_TEXT as (BE.WF_DATE_LOCK is null, 'green', if(DATE_ADD(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, interval 60 MINUTE)<now(), 'green', if(BE.WF_LOCKED_BY=0, 'yellow', 'red'))) as LOCK_STATUS,BE.WF_LOCKED_BY as WF_LOCKED_BY,DATE_FORMAT(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as WF_DATE_LOCK,BE.WF_COMMENTS as WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '359'))))
			)

			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

DETAIL_TEXT,BE.DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE as DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE,BE.SEARCHABLE_CONTENT as SEARCHABLE_CONTENT,BE.WF_STATUS_ID as WF_STATUS_ID,BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID as WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID,BE.WF_NEW as WF_NEW,if (BE.WF_DATE_LOCK is null, 'green', if(DATE_ADD(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, interval 60 MINUTE)<now(), 'green', if(BE.WF_LOCKED_BY=0, 'yellow', 'red'))) as LOCK_STATUS,BE.WF_LOCKED_BY as WF_LOCKED_BY,DATE_FORMAT(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as WF_DATE_LOCK,BE.WF_COMMENTS as WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '359'))))
			)
			
		 [Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock' (111)]

SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '429'))))
			)

SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

2010-07-13 16:53:17 - main -  MySql Query Error: SELECT  BE.ID as ID,BE.NAME as NAME,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_FROM)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y')) as DATE_ACTIVE_FROM,BE.PREVIEW_PICTURE as PREVIEW_PICTURE, FPEN0.VALUE as PROPERTY_NOVELTY_VALUE, FPEN0.ID as PROPERTY_NOVELTY_ENUM_ID, FPV0.ID as PROPERTY_NOVELTY_VALUE_ID, FPEN1.VALUE as PROPERTY_HIT_VALUE, FPEN1.ID as PROPERTY_HIT_ENUM_ID, FPV1.ID as PROPERTY_HIT_VALUE_ID, FPV2.VALUE as PROPERTY_COLLECTION_VALUE, FPV2.ID as PROPERTY_COLLECTION_VALUE_ID,BE.IBLOCK_ID as IBLOCK_ID,BE.SORT as SORT 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
			LEFT JOIN b_iblock_property FP0 ON FP0.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID AND  FP0.CODE='NOVELTY'
			LEFT JOIN b_iblock_property FP1 ON FP1.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID AND  FP1.CODE='HIT'
			LEFT JOIN b_iblock_property FP2 ON FP2.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID AND  FP2.CODE='COLLECTION'
			LEFT JOIN b_iblock_element_property FPV0 ON FPV0.IBLOCK_PROPERTY_ID = FP0.ID AND FPV0.IBLOCK_ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
			LEFT JOIN b_iblock_element_property FPV1 ON FPV1.IBLOCK_PROPERTY_ID = FP1.ID AND FPV1.IBLOCK_ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
			LEFT JOIN b_iblock_element_property FPV2 ON FPV2.IBLOCK_PROPERTY_ID = FP2.ID AND FPV2.IBLOCK_ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
			LEFT JOIN b_iblock_property_enum FPEN0 ON FPEN0.PROPERTY_ID = FPV0.IBLOCK_PROPERTY_ID AND FPV0.VALUE_ENUM = FPEN0.ID
			LEFT JOIN b_iblock_property_enum FPEN1 ON FPEN1.PROPERTY_ID = FPV1.IBLOCK_PROPERTY_ID AND FPV1.VALUE_ENUM = FPEN1.ID

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.IBLOCK_ID = '5'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE='Y'))))
				AND (((NOT(FPV0.VALUE_ENUM IS NULL))))

			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY

			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '204'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE=''))))
			)
			AND (((BE.WF_STATUS_ID=1 AND BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID IS NULL)))
			AND ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))

					,DATE_FORMAT(B.TIMESTAMP_X, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as TIMESTAMP_X
					,L.DIR as LANG_DIR
					,L.SERVER_NAME
				FROM
					b_iblock B
					INNER JOIN b_lang L ON L.LID=B.LID
				WHERE 1 = 1
					AND (
					B.ID IN (
				SELECT IBLOCK_ID
				FROM b_iblock_group IBG
				WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
				AND IBG.PERMISSION >= 'R'
			
					AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
				)
					OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND B.ID IN (
					SELECT IBLOCK_ID
					FROM b_iblock_right IBR
					INNER JOIN b_task_operation T ON T.TASK_ID = IBR.TASK_ID
					INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID = T.OPERATION_ID
					INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
					WHERE IBR.ENTITY_TYPE = 'iblock'
					AND O.NAME in ('section_read', 'element_read', 'section_element_bind', 'section_section_bind')
					
				))
				)
					 AND  ((((B.ACTIVE=''))))  AND  ((((B.ID = '14')))) 
				 []

DATE_CREATE,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(BE.DATE_CREATE) as DATE_CREATE_UNIX,BE.CREATED_BY as CREATED_BY,BE.IBLOCK_ID as IBLOCK_ID,BE.IBLOCK_SECTION_ID as IBLOCK_SECTION_ID,BE.ACTIVE as ACTIVE,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_FROM)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y')) as ACTIVE_FROM,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_TO)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y')) as ACTIVE_TO,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_FROM)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y')) as DATE_ACTIVE_FROM,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_TO)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y')) as DATE_ACTIVE_TO,BE.SORT as SORT,BE.NAME as NAME,BE.PREVIEW_PICTURE as PREVIEW_PICTURE,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT as PREVIEW_TEXT,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE as PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE,BE.DETAIL_PICTURE as DETAIL_PICTURE,BE.DETAIL_TEXT as DETAIL_TEXT,BE.DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE as DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE,BE.SEARCHABLE_CONTENT as SEARCHABLE_CONTENT,BE.WF_STATUS_ID as WF_STATUS_ID,BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID as WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID,BE.WF_LAST_HISTORY_ID as WF_LAST_HISTORY_ID,BE.WF_NEW as WF_NEW,if (BE.WF_DATE_LOCK is null, 'green', if(DATE_ADD(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, interval 60 MINUTE)<now(), 'green', if(BE.WF_LOCKED_BY=0, 'yellow', 'red'))) as LOCK_STATUS,BE.WF_LOCKED_BY as WF_LOCKED_BY,DATE_FORMAT(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as WF_DATE_LOCK,BE.WF_COMMENTS as WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '160'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE=''))))
			)
			AND (((BE.WF_STATUS_ID=1 AND BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID IS NULL)))
			AND ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))
			
		 []

			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_group_task GT
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=GT.TASK_ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE GT.GROUP_ID IN(2)
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=OP.VALUE
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_TASK'
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP

			FROM b_group_task GT
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=GT.TASK_ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE GT.GROUP_ID IN(2)

2012-08-18 13:27:09 - main - FILE: /home/avangard/public_html/bitrix/modules/main/classes/general/user.php<br> LINE: 2171 MySql Query Error: 
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_group_task GT
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=GT.TASK_ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE GT.GROUP_ID IN(2)
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=OP.VALUE
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_TASK'
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task T ON T.MODULE_ID=OP.MODULE_ID AND T.BINDING='module' AND T.LETTER=OP.VALUE AND T.SYS='Y'
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=T.ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_RIGHT'

2012-08-18 14:55:04 - main - FILE: /home/avangard/public_html/bitrix/modules/main/classes/general/user.php<br> LINE: 2171 MySql Query Error: 
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_group_task GT
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=GT.TASK_ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE GT.GROUP_ID IN(2)
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=OP.VALUE
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_TASK'
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task T ON T.MODULE_ID=OP.MODULE_ID AND T.BINDING='module' AND T.LETTER=OP.VALUE AND T.SYS='Y'
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=T.ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_RIGHT'
		 []

2012-08-18 15:01:17 - main - FILE: /home/avangard/public_html/bitrix/modules/main/classes/general/user.php<br> LINE: 2171 MySql Query Error: 
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_group_task GT
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=GT.TASK_ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE GT.GROUP_ID IN(2)
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=OP.VALUE
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_TASK'
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task T ON T.MODULE_ID=OP.MODULE_ID AND T.BINDING='module' AND T.LETTER=OP.VALUE AND T.SYS='Y'
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=T.ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_RIGHT'
		 []

2012-08-18 16:27:09 - main - FILE: /home/avangard/public_html/bitrix/modules/main/classes/general/user.php<br> LINE: 2171 MySql Query Error: 
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_group_task GT
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=GT.TASK_ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE GT.GROUP_ID IN(2)
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=OP.VALUE
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_TASK'
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task T ON T.MODULE_ID=OP.MODULE_ID AND T.BINDING='module' AND T.LETTER=OP.VALUE AND T.SYS='Y'
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=T.ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_RIGHT'
		 []

EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '566'))))
			)

				BS.*,
				B.LIST_PAGE_URL,
				B.SECTION_PAGE_URL,
				B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,
				B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,
				B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,
				BS.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.TIMESTAMP_X, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as TIMESTAMP_X,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.DATE_CREATE, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as DATE_CREATE
			
				FROM b_iblock_section BS
					INNER JOIN b_iblock B ON BS.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
					
				
				WHERE 1=1
				
				
				AND  ((((BS.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.GLOBAL_ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.IBLOCK_ID = '8')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.ID = '6')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ID = '8')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT SR.SECTION_ID
				FROM b_iblock_section_right SR
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = SR.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE SR.SECTION_ID = BS.ID
				AND IBR.OP_SREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))  []

				DATE_FORMAT(BS.DATE_CREATE, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as DATE_CREATE
			
				FROM b_iblock_section BS
					INNER JOIN b_iblock B ON BS.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
					
				
				WHERE 1=1

				AND  ((((BS.GLOBAL_ACTIVE=''))))

ACTIVE,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_FROM)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y')) as ACTIVE_FROM,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_TO)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y')) as ACTIVE_TO,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_FROM)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y')) as DATE_ACTIVE_FROM,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_TO)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y')) as DATE_ACTIVE_TO,BE.SORT as SORT,BE.NAME as NAME,BE.PREVIEW_PICTURE as PREVIEW_PICTURE,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT as PREVIEW_TEXT,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE as PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE,BE.DETAIL_PICTURE as DETAIL_PICTURE,BE.DETAIL_TEXT as DETAIL_TEXT,BE.DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE as DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE,BE.SEARCHABLE_CONTENT as SEARCHABLE_CONTENT,BE.WF_STATUS_ID as WF_STATUS_ID,BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID as WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID,BE.WF_LAST_HISTORY_ID as WF_LAST_HISTORY_ID,BE.WF_NEW as WF_NEW,if (BE.WF_DATE_LOCK is null, 'green', if(DATE_ADD(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, interval 60 MINUTE)<now(), 'green', if(BE.WF_LOCKED_BY=0, 'yellow', 'red'))) as LOCK_STATUS,BE.WF_LOCKED_BY as WF_LOCKED_BY,DATE_FORMAT(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as WF_DATE_LOCK,BE.WF_COMMENTS as WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '3089'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE=''))))
			)
			AND (((BE.WF_STATUS_ID=1 AND BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID IS NULL)))
			AND ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))
			
		 []

			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID

			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (

				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))

			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))

				SELECT DISTINCT
					B.*
					,B.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID
					,DATE_FORMAT(B.TIMESTAMP_X, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as TIMESTAMP_X
					,L.DIR as LANG_DIR
					,L.SERVER_NAME
				FROM
					b_iblock B
					INNER JOIN b_lang L ON L.LID=B.LID
				WHERE 1 = 1
					AND (
					B.ID IN (
				SELECT IBLOCK_ID
				FROM b_iblock_group IBG
				WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
				AND IBG.PERMISSION >= 'R'

				)
					OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND B.ID IN (
					SELECT IBLOCK_ID
					FROM b_iblock_right IBR
					INNER JOIN b_task_operation T ON T.TASK_ID = IBR.TASK_ID

				SELECT DISTINCT
					B.*
					,B.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID
					,DATE_FORMAT(B.TIMESTAMP_X, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as TIMESTAMP_X
					,L.DIR as LANG_DIR
					,L.SERVER_NAME
				FROM
					b_iblock B
					INNER JOIN b_lang L ON L.LID=B.LID
				WHERE 1 = 1
					AND (
					B.ID IN (
				SELECT IBLOCK_ID
				FROM b_iblock_group IBG
				WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
				AND IBG.PERMISSION >= 'R'
			
					AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
				)
					OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND B.ID IN (
					SELECT IBLOCK_ID
					FROM b_iblock_right IBR
					INNER JOIN b_task_operation T ON T.TASK_ID = IBR.TASK_ID
					INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID = T.OPERATION_ID
					INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
					WHERE IBR.ENTITY_TYPE = 'iblock'
					AND O.NAME in ('section_read', 'element_read', 'section_element_bind', 'section_section_bind')
					
				))
				)
					 AND  ((((B.ACTIVE=''))))  AND  ((((B.ID = '5'))))

				BS.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.TIMESTAMP_X, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as TIMESTAMP_X,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.DATE_CREATE, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as DATE_CREATE
			
				FROM b_iblock_section BS
					INNER JOIN b_iblock B ON BS.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
					
				
				WHERE 1=1
				
				
				AND  ((((BS.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.GLOBAL_ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.IBLOCK_ID = '0')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ID = '0')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT SR.SECTION_ID
				FROM b_iblock_section_right SR
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = SR.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE SR.SECTION_ID = BS.ID
				AND IBR.OP_SREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))  []

			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			AND (

				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))

			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))

				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0

LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '3210'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE=''))))
			)
			AND (((BE.WF_STATUS_ID=1 AND BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID IS NULL)))
			AND ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))
			
		 []

WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '2760'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE=''))))
			)
			AND (((BE.WF_STATUS_ID=1 AND BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID IS NULL)))
			AND ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))
			
		 []

DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y')) as DATE_ACTIVE_TO,BE.SORT as SORT,BE.NAME as NAME,BE.PREVIEW_PICTURE as PREVIEW_PICTURE,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT as PREVIEW_TEXT,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE as PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE,BE.DETAIL_PICTURE as DETAIL_PICTURE,BE.DETAIL_TEXT as DETAIL_TEXT,BE.DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE as DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE,BE.SEARCHABLE_CONTENT as SEARCHABLE_CONTENT,BE.WF_STATUS_ID as WF_STATUS_ID,BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID as WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID,BE.WF_LAST_HISTORY_ID as WF_LAST_HISTORY_ID,BE.WF_NEW as WF_NEW,if (BE.WF_DATE_LOCK is null, 'green', if(DATE_ADD(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, interval 60 MINUTE)<now(), 'green', if(BE.WF_LOCKED_BY=0, 'yellow', 'red'))) as LOCK_STATUS,BE.WF_LOCKED_BY as WF_LOCKED_BY,DATE_FORMAT(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as WF_DATE_LOCK,BE.WF_COMMENTS as WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY

ACTIVE,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_FROM)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y')) as ACTIVE_FROM,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_TO)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y')) as ACTIVE_TO,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_FROM)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y')) as DATE_ACTIVE_FROM,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_TO)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y')) as DATE_ACTIVE_TO,BE.SORT as SORT,BE.NAME as NAME,BE.PREVIEW_PICTURE as PREVIEW_PICTURE,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT as PREVIEW_TEXT,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE as PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE,BE.DETAIL_PICTURE as DETAIL_PICTURE,BE.DETAIL_TEXT as DETAIL_TEXT,BE.DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE as DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE,BE.SEARCHABLE_CONTENT as SEARCHABLE_CONTENT,BE.WF_STATUS_ID as WF_STATUS_ID,BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID as WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID,BE.WF_LAST_HISTORY_ID as WF_LAST_HISTORY_ID,BE.WF_NEW as WF_NEW,if (BE.WF_DATE_LOCK is null, 'green', if(DATE_ADD(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, interval 60 MINUTE)<now(), 'green', if(BE.WF_LOCKED_BY=0, 'yellow', 'red'))) as LOCK_STATUS,BE.WF_LOCKED_BY as WF_LOCKED_BY,DATE_FORMAT(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as WF_DATE_LOCK,BE.WF_COMMENTS as WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

60 MINUTE)<now(), 'green', if(BE.WF_LOCKED_BY=0, 'yellow', 'red'))) as LOCK_STATUS,BE.WF_LOCKED_BY as WF_LOCKED_BY,DATE_FORMAT(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as WF_DATE_LOCK,BE.WF_COMMENTS as WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '1869'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE=''))))
			)
			AND (((BE.WF_STATUS_ID=1 AND BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID IS NULL)))
			AND ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))

EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '330'))))
			)

				B.LIST_PAGE_URL,
				B.SECTION_PAGE_URL,
				B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,
				B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,
				B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,
				BS.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.TIMESTAMP_X, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as TIMESTAMP_X,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.DATE_CREATE, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as DATE_CREATE
			
				FROM b_iblock_section BS
					INNER JOIN b_iblock B ON BS.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
					
				
				WHERE 1=1
				
				
				AND  ((((BS.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.GLOBAL_ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.IBLOCK_ID = '8')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.ID = '6')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ID = '8')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((

			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT SR.SECTION_ID
				FROM b_iblock_section_right SR
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = SR.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE SR.SECTION_ID = BS.ID
				AND IBR.OP_SREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))  []
    CDatabase::Query < CIBlockSection::GetList < include < CBitrixComponent::__IncludeComponent < CBitrixComponent::IncludeComponent
	/home/avangard/public_html/bitrix/modules/iblock/classes/mysql/iblocksection.php:309
	/home/avangard/public_html/bitrix/components/anp/catalog.section/component.php:152
	/home/avangard/public_html/bitrix/modules/main/classes/general/component.php:211
	/home/avangard/public_html/bitrix/modules/main/classes/general/component.php:250
	/home/avangard/public_html/bitrix/modules/main/classes/general/main.php:1167

WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '160'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE=''))))
			)
			AND (((BE.WF_STATUS_ID=1 AND BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID IS NULL)))
			AND ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))
			
		 []

2012-08-19 15:22:21 - main - FILE: /home/avangard/public_html/bitrix/modules/iblock/classes/mysql/iblocksection.php<br> LINE: 309 MySql Query Error: SELECT DISTINCT 
				BS.*,
				B.LIST_PAGE_URL,
				B.SECTION_PAGE_URL,
				B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,
				B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,
				B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,
				BS.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.TIMESTAMP_X, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as TIMESTAMP_X,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.DATE_CREATE, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as DATE_CREATE
			
				FROM b_iblock_section BS
					INNER JOIN b_iblock B ON BS.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
					
				
				WHERE 1=1
				
				
				AND  ((((BS.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.GLOBAL_ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.IBLOCK_ID = '0')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ID = '0')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT SR.SECTION_ID
				FROM b_iblock_section_right SR
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = SR.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE SR.SECTION_ID = BS.ID
				AND IBR.OP_SREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))  []

				F.*,
				F.FIRST_SITE_ID,
				F.FIRST_SITE_ID									LID,
				F.SID,
				F.SID											VARNAME,
				DATE_FORMAT(F.TIMESTAMP_X, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s')	TIMESTAMP_X,
				count(distinct D1.ID)							C_FIELDS,
				count(distinct D2.ID)							QUESTIONS,
				count(distinct S.ID)							STATUSES
			FROM b_form F

			SELECT
				F.*,
				F.FIRST_SITE_ID,
				F.FIRST_SITE_ID									LID,
				F.SID,
				F.SID											VARNAME,
				DATE_FORMAT(F.TIMESTAMP_X, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s')	TIMESTAMP_X,
				count(distinct D1.ID)							C_FIELDS,
				count(distinct D2.ID)							QUESTIONS,
				count(distinct S.ID)							STATUSES
			FROM b_form F
			LEFT JOIN b_form_status S ON (S.FORM_ID = F.ID)
			LEFT JOIN b_form_field D1 ON (D1.FORM_ID = F.ID and D1.ADDITIONAL='Y')
			LEFT JOIN b_form_field D2 ON (D2.FORM_ID = F.ID and D2.ADDITIONAL<>'Y')
			WHERE
				 F.ID = '5' 
			GROUP BY
				F.ID

'%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_FROM, '%d.%m.%Y')) as DATE_ACTIVE_FROM,IF(EXTRACT(HOUR_SECOND FROM BE.ACTIVE_TO)>0, DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(BE.ACTIVE_TO, '%d.%m.%Y')) as DATE_ACTIVE_TO,BE.SORT as SORT,BE.NAME as NAME,BE.PREVIEW_PICTURE as PREVIEW_PICTURE,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT as PREVIEW_TEXT,BE.PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE as PREVIEW_TEXT_TYPE,BE.DETAIL_PICTURE as DETAIL_PICTURE,BE.DETAIL_TEXT as DETAIL_TEXT,BE.DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE as DETAIL_TEXT_TYPE,BE.SEARCHABLE_CONTENT as SEARCHABLE_CONTENT,BE.WF_STATUS_ID as WF_STATUS_ID,BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID as WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID,BE.WF_LAST_HISTORY_ID as WF_LAST_HISTORY_ID,BE.WF_NEW as WF_NEW,if (BE.WF_DATE_LOCK is null, 'green', if(DATE_ADD(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, interval 60 MINUTE)<now(), 'green', if(BE.WF_LOCKED_BY=0, 'yellow', 'red'))) as LOCK_STATUS,BE.WF_LOCKED_BY as WF_LOCKED_BY,DATE_FORMAT(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as WF_DATE_LOCK,BE.WF_COMMENTS as WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '160'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE=''))))
			)
			AND (((BE.WF_STATUS_ID=1 AND BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID IS NULL)))
			AND ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))
			
		 []

				BS.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.TIMESTAMP_X, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as TIMESTAMP_X,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.DATE_CREATE, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as DATE_CREATE
			
				FROM b_iblock_section BS
					INNER JOIN b_iblock B ON BS.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
					
				
				WHERE 1=1
				
				
				AND  ((((BS.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.GLOBAL_ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.IBLOCK_ID = '8')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.ID = '6')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ID = '8')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((

			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT SR.SECTION_ID
				FROM b_iblock_section_right SR
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = SR.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE SR.SECTION_ID = BS.ID
				AND IBR.OP_SREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))  []

				BS.*,
				B.LIST_PAGE_URL,
				B.SECTION_PAGE_URL,
				B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,
				B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,
				B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,
				BS.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.TIMESTAMP_X, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as TIMESTAMP_X,
				DATE_FORMAT(BS.DATE_CREATE, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as DATE_CREATE
			
				FROM b_iblock_section BS
					INNER JOIN b_iblock B ON BS.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
					
				
				WHERE 1=1
				
				
				AND  ((((BS.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.GLOBAL_ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((((BS.IBLOCK_ID = '0')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ID = '0')))) 
				AND  ((((B.ACTIVE='')))) 
				AND  ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT SR.SECTION_ID
				FROM b_iblock_section_right SR
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = SR.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE SR.SECTION_ID = BS.ID
				AND IBR.OP_SREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))  []

CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '160'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE=''))))
			)
			AND (((BE.WF_STATUS_ID=1 AND BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID IS NULL)))
			AND ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))
			
		 []

			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_group_task GT
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=GT.TASK_ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE GT.GROUP_ID IN(2)
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=OP.VALUE
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_TASK'
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task T ON T.MODULE_ID=OP.MODULE_ID AND T.BINDING='module' AND T.LETTER=OP.VALUE AND T.SYS='Y'
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=T.ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_RIGHT'

			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_group_task GT
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=GT.TASK_ID
				INNER JOIN b_operation O ON O.ID=T_O.OPERATION_ID
			WHERE GT.GROUP_ID IN(2)
			UNION
			SELECT O.NAME OPERATION_NAME
			FROM b_option OP
				INNER JOIN b_task_operation T_O ON T_O.TASK_ID=OP.VALUE

			WHERE OP.NAME='GROUP_DEFAULT_TASK'

WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as IBLOCK_CODE,B.NAME as IBLOCK_NAME,B.XML_ID as IBLOCK_EXTERNAL_ID,B.DETAIL_PAGE_URL as DETAIL_PAGE_URL,B.LIST_PAGE_URL as LIST_PAGE_URL,DATE_FORMAT(BE.DATE_CREATE, '%Y.%m.%d') as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '160'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE=''))))
			)
			AND (((BE.WF_STATUS_ID=1 AND BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID IS NULL)))
			AND ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))
			
		 []

60 MINUTE)<now(), 'green', if(BE.WF_LOCKED_BY=0, 'yellow', 'red'))) as LOCK_STATUS,BE.WF_LOCKED_BY as WF_LOCKED_BY,DATE_FORMAT(BE.WF_DATE_LOCK, '%d.%m.%Y %H:%i:%s') as WF_DATE_LOCK,BE.WF_COMMENTS as WF_COMMENTS,BE.IN_SECTIONS as IN_SECTIONS,BE.SHOW_COUNTER as SHOW_COUNTER,BE.SHOW_COUNTER_START as SHOW_COUNTER_START,BE.CODE as CODE,BE.TAGS as TAGS,BE.XML_ID as XML_ID,BE.XML_ID as EXTERNAL_ID,BE.TMP_ID as TMP_ID,concat('(',U.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(U.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as USER_NAME,concat('(',UL.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UL.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UL.LAST_NAME,'')) as LOCKED_USER_NAME,concat('(',UC.LOGIN,') ',ifnull(UC.NAME,''),' ',ifnull(UC.LAST_NAME,'')) as CREATED_USER_NAME,L.DIR as LANG_DIR,B.LID as LID,B.IBLOCK_TYPE_ID as IBLOCK_TYPE_ID,B.CODE as CREATED_DATE,if(BE.WF_STATUS_ID = 1, 'Y', 'N') as BP_PUBLISHED 
			FROM b_iblock B
			INNER JOIN b_lang L ON B.LID=L.LID
			INNER JOIN b_iblock_element BE ON BE.IBLOCK_ID = B.ID
						LEFT JOIN b_user U ON U.ID=BE.MODIFIED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UL ON UL.ID=BE.WF_LOCKED_BY
			LEFT JOIN b_user UC ON UC.ID=BE.CREATED_BY

			WHERE 1=1 
			AND (
			
				((((BE.ID = '471'))))
				AND (((BE.ACTIVE_TO >= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_TO IS NULL) AND (BE.ACTIVE_FROM <= now() OR BE.ACTIVE_FROM IS NULL)))
				AND ((((BE.ACTIVE=''))))
			)
			AND (((BE.WF_STATUS_ID=1 AND BE.WF_PARENT_ELEMENT_ID IS NULL)))
			AND ((
				B.ID IN (
			SELECT IBLOCK_ID
			FROM b_iblock_group IBG
			WHERE IBG.GROUP_ID IN (2)
			AND IBG.PERMISSION >= ''
		
				AND (IBG.PERMISSION='X' OR B.ACTIVE='Y')
			)
				OR (B.RIGHTS_MODE = 'E' AND EXISTS (
				SELECT ER.ELEMENT_ID
				FROM b_iblock_element_right ER
				INNER JOIN b_iblock_right IBR ON IBR.ID = ER.RIGHT_ID
				INNER JOIN b_user_access UA ON UA.ACCESS_CODE = IBR.GROUP_CODE AND UA.USER_ID = 0
				WHERE ER.ELEMENT_ID = BE.ID
				AND IBR.OP_EREAD = 'Y'
				
			))
			))
